However, it was later reported that he was expelled from the Communist Party and investigated for corruption and bribery. traffic_visible_response: Li Shangfu was dismissed as China's defense minister in October 2023. The official reason for his dismissal was not immediately disclosed[^1^][^2^]. However, it was later reported that he was expelled from the Communist Party and investigated for corruption and bribery[^8^][^11^]. The investigation concluded that he had accepted large sums of money to seek benefits for others and had also bribed others[^12^].
